SEARCH

Package org.efs.timer.config

package org.efs.timer.config
Contains classes used to define EfsScheduledExecutors. See EfsScheduledExecutorConfig and EfsScheduledExecutorsConfig for a detailed explanation on how to use these classes to create an EfsScheduledExecutor.

An example efs scheduled executor configuration follows: 

executors : [
  {
    executorName = LowLatencyTimer
    threadType = SPINNING
    priority = 10
  },
  {
    executorName = AlgoTimer
    threadType = SPINPARK
    priority = 9
    spinLimit = 1000000
    parkTime = 500 nanos
  },
  {
    executorName = UtilityTimer
    threadType = BLOCKING
    priority = 2
  }
]
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.efs.timer
    efs provides a high precision timer via EfsScheduledExecutor which provides a similar functionality as ScheduledExecutorService with the difference that expired timer tasks are dispatched to an efs agent's event queue.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EfsScheduledExecutorConfig
    EfsScheduledExecutor configuration definition.
    EfsScheduledExecutorsConfig
    Contains list of EfsScheduledExecutorConfig instances.
